axiom df-hlg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(chlg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), copab(s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s3), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), w3a(wne(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(citv, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(citv, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

axiom df-hlg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ hlG =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |((s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0))‚àß(s2 ‚â† s1 ‚àß s3 ‚â† s1 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà(s1[(Itv ` s0)]s3)‚à® s3 ‚àà(s1[(Itv ` s0)]s2))))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: ishlg
blocks.content: Rays : Definition 6.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 43. With this definition, ` A ( K `` C ) B ` means that ` A ` and ` B ` are on the same ray with initial point ` C ` . This follows the same notation as Schwabhauser where rays are first defined as a relation. It is possible to recover the ray itself using e.g. ` ( ( K `` C ) " { A } ) ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: hlln
blocks.content: The half-line relation implies colinearity, part of Theorem 6.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hlln(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(chlg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c7, c3), c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))))
  mpjaodan(w0, w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)))
  3mix1d(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1))), wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, c4))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)))
  3mix2d(wa(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))), wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwncom(c1, c0, c6, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), wa(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, c4))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)))
  simp3d(w0, wo(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))), wne(c0, c3), wne(c1, c3))
  tgellng(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wne(c1, c3), wne(c0, c3), wo(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wne(c0, c3), wne(c1, c3), wo(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)))), wbr(c0, cfv(c7, c3), c1))
  ishlg(c0, c7, c3, c1, c6, c4, c5, cstrkg, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hlln(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Itv ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(hlG ` c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà TarskiG)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LineG ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(c7 ` c3)]c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3), (c0 ‚àà(c1[c6]c3)‚à® c1 ‚àà(c0[c6]c3)‚à® c3 ‚àà(c1[c6]c0)))
  mpjaodan(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c1[c6]c3)‚à® c1 ‚àà(c0[c6]c3)‚à® c3 ‚àà(c1[c6]c0)), c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1), c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0))
  3mix1d((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1)), c0 ‚àà(c1[c6]c3), c1 ‚àà(c0[c6]c3), c3 ‚àà(c1[c6]c0))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, (dist ` c5), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1)))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1), c5 ‚àà TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1), c3 ‚àà c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1), c0 ‚àà c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1), c1 ‚àà c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1))
  3mix2d((w0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0)), c0 ‚àà(c1[c6]c3), c1 ‚àà(c0[c6]c3), c3 ‚àà(c1[c6]c0))
  tgbtwncom(c1, c0, c6, c3, c4, c5, (dist ` c5), (w0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0)))
  eqid((dist ` c5))
  adantr(w0, c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0), c5 ‚àà TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0), c3 ‚àà c4)
  adantr(w0, c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0), c1 ‚àà c4)
  adantr(w0, c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0), c0 ‚àà c4)
  simpr(w0, c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0))
  simp3d(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1)‚à® c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0)), c0 ‚â† c3, c1 ‚â† c3)
  tgellng(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  simp2d(w0, c1 ‚â† c3, c0 ‚â† c3, (c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1)‚à® c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0)))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà(c3[c6]c1)‚à® c1 ‚àà(c3[c6]c0))), c0[(c7 ` c3)]c1)
  ishlg(c0, c7, c3, c1, c6, c4, c5, cstrkg, w0)
}

blocks.name: hleqnid
blocks.content: The endpoint does not belong to the half-line. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hleqnid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(chlg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c3))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2))), wi(w0, wcel(c6, c3)))
  mtand(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2), wne(c0, c0))
  a1i(w0, wn(wne(c0, c0)))
  neirr(c0)
  hlne1(c0, c0, c3, c4, c5, c1, c2, cstrkg, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c0), c2))
}

thm hleqnid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0[(c1 ` c0)]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Itv ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(hlG ` c4)

blocks.name: hlid
blocks.content: The half-line relation is reflexive. Theorem 6.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hlid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(chlg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c0)), wi(w0, wcel(c6, c3)))
  mpbir3and(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c0), wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c2), wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, c0))))
  olcd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, c0)))
  tgbtwntriv2(c0, c2, c5, c3, c4, cfv(cds, c4), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c4))
  ishlg(c0, c1, c2, c0, c5, c3, c4, cstrkg, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hlid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(c1 ` c2)]c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Itv ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(hlG ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà TarskiG)

} = {

  mpbir3and(w0, c0[(c1 ` c2)]c0, c0 ‚â† c2, c0 ‚â† c2, (c0 ‚àà(c2[c5]c0)‚à® c0 ‚àà(c2[c5]c0)))
  olcd(w0, c0 ‚àà(c2[c5]c0), c0 ‚àà(c2[c5]c0))
  tgbtwntriv2(c0, c2, c5, c3, c4, (dist ` c4), w0)
  eqid((dist ` c4))
  ishlg(c0, c1, c2, c0, c5, c3, c4, cstrkg, w0)

blocks.name: hltr
blocks.content: The half-line relation is transitive. Theorem 6.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hltr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(chlg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, cfv(c1, c2), c3))
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wne(c0, c2), wne(c3, c2), wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c2, c6, c0))))
  hlne1(c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, cstrkg, w0)
  hlne2(c3, c2, c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, cstrkg, w0)
  mpjaodan(w0, wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c2, c6, c0))), wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c0)))
  mpjaodan(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7))), wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c2, c6, c0))), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c2, c6, c7)))
  orcd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7))), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3))), wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c2, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwnexch(c0, c2, c6, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), c7, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7))), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c0, c4))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c7, c4))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, c4))
  simplr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7)), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c6, c7))), wcel(c7, co(c2, c6, c3)))
